tool.name: Neighborhood Profile [SPAC][DMAP]
tool.description: Calculate the neighborhood profile in terms of count of neighbor cells for every cell.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information.
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "directory", "name": "dataframe_dir"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --list-values Bins Anchor_Neighbor_List --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.neighborhood_profile_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Analysis
param.label: Upstream Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: Annotation_of_interest
param.label: Annotation of interest
param.help: Annotation of interest to define cell labels.

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: Radii in micro meter that form the bands around the center phenotype to count the neighbor cells

param.name: Stratify_By
param.label: Stratify By
param.help: The annotation to stratify the dataset when generating the profiles (e.g., slide name). If a value other than "None" is passed, the dataset will be stratified by the unique labels in the annotation column. Use "None" without quotes to disable (e.g., all cells are from one region or slide)

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: A list of anchor;neighbor cell labels to generate the results. The two types should be separated with a ';'. For example, if if the anchor is "T cells" and the neighbor is "B cells", enter the value: "T cells; B cells" without the quotes.

tool.help: **Neighborhood Profile [SPAC][DMAP]** Calculate the neighborhood profile in terms of count of neighbor cells for every cell.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information. **Outputs:** - dataframe: directory (dataframe_dir)
